tool_description: Koliseo is an event ticketing platform with an attitude.
name: Koliseo
title: Koliseo

api_list.name: Get User

required_parameters.name: user
required_parameters.description: The uuid of the user to retrieve

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://koliseo.p.rapidapi.com/icoloma"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koliseo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://koliseo.p.rapidapi.com/{user}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koliseo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Ticket
Get Tickets
api_list.description: Get sold tickets for an Event

required_parameters.name: performanceid
required_parameters.description: The internal ID of the Performance

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: The cursor to continue a previous request

api_list.name: Is discount valid
api_list.description: Check if a discount is available for this event

required_parameters.name: discount
required_parameters.description: Name of the discount to check

api_list.name: Get Discount
Get performances in a payment
api_list.description: Retrieve the list of performances that compose a Payment

api_list.name: Get Event QR
api_list.description: Retrieve the QR code of an Event for offline promotion

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: The width of the returned square image.

api_list.name: Get event
api_list.description: Retrieve a JSON representation of an Event

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Will search for users and shows matching this query. Advanced queries are available like "uuid: icoloma" or "description:"foo bar" "

api_list.name: Get performances in user balance
api_list.description: Retrieve the list of all performances that have not yet been paid
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://koliseo.p.rapidapi.com/icoloma/balance/performances"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koliseo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
